content: Hey, I'm considering use of the component model proposal, but I would need it to be stable, so I'm curious about timelines. Could anybody give me a guesstimate as to how far along component model is and how long might it be before it gets into WebAssembly/spec? Months? Years?

I tried investigating this on my own, but it is pretty hard to get a grasp on the state of this proposal. For instance it does not appear in https://webassembly.org/roadmap/ which I used to keep track of the state of the other proposals.
